displaySolutionDescription: Task is updated to contain the solution.
a11yClickableTextLabel: Full text where words can be marked
taskDescription: As you read the story, click on the names of flowers.
textField: The town of *Rose* Village is a quaint little town which boasts the most exquisite flower gardens anyone has ever seen. Flower enthusiasts from around the world come to see the gardens of *Rose* Village. When visitors first enter the town, they are met with a welcome sign that is draped in fragrant white, yellow, and purple *Jasmine*.  Once checked-in at the Hotel de *Hibiscus* they can stroll through the town square and down *Peony* Pass and picnic at *Waterlily* Falls. Finally, travelers end their day by sitting on the lawn of Discovery Green and listening to the *Orchid* City Orchestra while watching the sun disappear behind the picturesque horizon. Whether you are a flower enthusiast or not, *Rose* Village is the place to experience the most splendid blooms known to man.
